Questions.Description: Fathym offers a number of ways to get started deploying your website, from no code to your code, and pre-built open source solutions.
Questions.Title: Would you like to create or deploy a website?

Questions.Description: Connecting to Github allows you easy, quick access to your projects, files and history.
Questions.Title: Would you like to connect to your Github?

Questions.Description: Importing an existing project is one of the easiest and fastest ways to get it published.
Questions.Title: Would you like to Import an Existing Project?

Questions.Description: Templates are a simple, efficient way to create a project and will give you immediate results.
Questions.Title: Would you like to use a template to create your project?
